articles.title: Paulo Ferreira Naibert
articles.contents:
About
My name is Paulo Ferreira Naibert, I have a Phd in Applied Economics from Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul.
My research focused mainly in Stock and Bond Markets, and portfolio selection by quantitative methods. I have experience in R software and \(\LaTeX\).
My main interests are programming and Economics.
